zone_name.description: [string]The name of the zone to reference in the HealthComponent

recharge_delay.description: How long after taking damage will the shield start to recharge?

broken_recharge_delay.description: How long after the shield being destroyed will the shield start to recharge?

recharge_rate.description: How much charge to recharge per second.

starter_charge_on_recharge.description: How much initial charge do we get once we are no longer broken?

activated_visibility_mask.description: [string]Visibility mask to show when this shield zone activates. Will hide when shield zone deactivates.

charge_event_triggers_override.description: Events that get played at certain charge percentages

shield_audio_node_override.description: [string]The audio node to use to play shield zone sounds. Overrides any audio node set by the DamageZoneShieldComponent

shield_recharge_sound_override.description: [wwise]Sound event to play when the shield zone starts recharging.
